price: “Rwose dutinya umunsi ukomeye kandi uzaba urimo ingorane, uturutse kwa Nyagasani wacu, uzatuma (uburanga bw’abahakanyi) bwijima.”
arabic: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوۡمًا عَبُوسٗا قَمۡطَرِيرٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: innā nakhāfu min rabbinā yawman ʿabūsan qamṭarīran
